extendedInfo.description: This is the Ad supported Version of Baby Basics!The Baby Basics will help you in ensuring that your child is provided adequate periodic health care supervision and will help promote your child's optimal physical, emotional, and intellectual growth and development.The Baby Basics can * help you track your child's routine immunizations to help prevent disease,* help educate you on the screening procedures your doctor may perform on your child for early detection and treatment of illness, * provide parental guidance and instruction for proper nutrition, accident prevention, and * help contribute to your knowledge the specific care required for the rearing of your child at their various stages of development. The Baby Basics uses the recommended preventive health care schedule for children who are developing normally with insight for months 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 24 and at years 3, 4, 5. We are sorry that we have had to place advertisements in the application. Get the full version to remove these advertisements and to support the development of new features.Please rate this app if you like it or contact me with your problems! We have some cool enhancement ideas, but without your feedback regarding the current form of the application, it is hard to see what you like.@Sk8r4Life if you would have asked, I could have pointed out that you can switch the unit of measures in your preferences.If you think that something is missing or you are having problems, please let us know by email or by visiting our website at www.getthebabybasics.com!Thank you for your support.

reviews.title: Not what I was looking for...
reviews.author: Haleigh Oliemuller

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I love that you can record your babys growth & percentiles. You can look ahead of time to see what to expect at their next doc appt & see what milestones they should be hitting. The only reason it gets 4 stars is because they dont have an option for 5, 7,8 months etc. It goes from newborn to 2 months, 4 mo, 6 mo, 9 mo, to 1 year & so on. Still a great app though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Helpful for me. I like the vaccinations reminders and milestones. Like the update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Personal Dislike
reviews.comment: App seems to work fine, I don\'t like how u can\'t just enter in pounds instead of kilograms, inches instead of centemeters, who wants to calculate that & care for a baby, too much! Not convienient for mom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Huge blessing!
reviews.comment: I think I would be lost without this app! Definately has helped keep me on a schedule
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the immunization reminders. Excellent resource for new parents. I bought the full version. Not fun, but super informative!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Feel like a well informed mom now! Love the calendar reminders for my darlings vaccination schedule.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a wonderful app. No problem. Great idea!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! The milestone function is great. I use this app every day. Life and time saver! A parent must.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I hate that it only has the first 2months only..i cant evwn see if its worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Is not really intresting for teenages!

reviews.comment: The trial version doesnt allow you to do/view ANYTHING
